alert.note: Alert for Catahoula; Concordia; Franklin; Richland; Tensas (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued August 20 at 2:46PM CDT until August 21 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM TO 8 PM CDT MONDAY FOR PORTIONS OF NORTHEAST LOUISIANA AND SOUTHWEST TO SOUTH CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI... The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from 9 AM to 8 PM CDT Monday. * AFFECTED AREA...Richland, Franklin LA, Catahoula, Tensas and Concordia parishes in Louisiana. Claiborne, Copiah, Jefferson, Adams, Franklin MS, Lincoln, Lawrence, Jefferson Davis, Marion, Lamar and Forrest counties in Mississippi. * WIND...east to southeast up to 10 to 15 mph with gusts up to 20 to 25 mph. * HUMIDITY...as low as 30 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning should be avoided.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures will create explosive fire growth potential.
